ABOUT.INTRO:
REVIVE is a non-governmental and non-profit organization carrying out medical humanitarian missions in developing countries with focus on Africa. REVIVEvzw is fully independent and neutral in all its aspects. The organization does not have any commercial, political nor religious interests.

Throughout its activities REVIVEvzw brings specialized medical care to people, who, due to their living conditions, normally do not have access to it.
